## SphereCreationOptions interface

Creation options for sphere shape

**Signature:**

```typescript
interface SphereCreationOptions extends ShapeCreationOptions 
```
**Extends:** [ShapeCreationOptions](doc/markdown/./scene.shapecreationoptions.md)
